V.iii.1.B.4.a
.
Evaluating Noncompensable Knee Conditions
Evaluate a noncompensable knee condition by analogy to
38 CFR 4.71a, DC 5257
if
there is no associated arthritis
the schedular criteria for a noncompensable evaluation under
38 CFR 4.71a, DC 5260
or
DC 5261
are not met,
and
the condition cannot be appropriately evaluated under
38 CFR 4.71a, DC 5258, 5259, 5262, or 5263
.
References
:Â  For more information on
using analogous DCs, see
38 CFR 4.20
, and
when to assign a 0-percent evaluation, see
38 CFR 4.31
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Musculoskeletal Disabilities of the Extremities and Spine
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
